author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Spooked
Wall Street is gearing up for what could be another volatile day. Financial markets plunged Tuesday amid renewed doubts about whether the stock marketâ€™s nine-year rally is sustainable. The yield on the 10-year Treasury note hit 3% for the first time since 2014 in a vote of confidence for the economic expansion, but warnings from large companies such as Caterpillar that profits were peaking helped send the Dow industrials tumbling 424.56 points, leaving it 9.7% below its Jan. 26 record close. Investors...
